Title: The Bleakening - Part One & Two
Director: Bernard Derriman, Brian LoSchiavo, Chris Song
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Linda wants to add some extra cheer to the holidays by throwing a holiday party.
